headline: Ask HN: What is the current state of Recommenation services(inhouse, SaaS etc.)?
description:
Hi,

Just wondered with lack of good recomendations(cross/up selling) in many ecommerce sites. I.e. - looking for gravel/cyclocross bicycle. Checking out most popular bicycle sellers: 1. https://www.bikesonline.com/2022-marin-gestalt-gravel-bike No recommendations. "Customers Also Viewed" section looks weird.

2. https://www.chainreactioncycles.com/vitus-energie-evo-crs-cx-bike-force-2022/rp-prod202342 "Helmets" and "Jackets"?? Weird set. Better than nothing, but I want more. "Also Recommended" looks weird.

3. https://www.bike24.com/p2415518.html?menu=1000,173 "Related products" shows me weird set of products - kickstands, KNOT stems and very expensive bike.

4. https://www.merlincycles.com/merlin-malt-g2x-grx-gravel-bike-2022-197443.html No recommendations.

5. https://www.competitivecyclist.com/why-cycles-r-v4-rival-gravel-bike?skid=WYC000G-TIT-L Similar bikes - looks weird. "Purchase Together" - tires and tubes??

What I'd expect - what bikes other people look also, what accessories people bought(shoes, pedals, helmets, clothing, gloves, spare parts etc.), suggest me product bundles - most popular sets.

What do you think, why popular ecommerce sites do not suggest more related goods? SaaS companies didn't reach them yet? Businesses don't want to implement recommendations? Other reason?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 推荐服务（内部、SaaS等）的现状是什么？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 推薦服務（內部、SaaS等）的現狀是什麼？
description_zh-Hans:
嗨，

我想知道在许多电子商务网站上缺乏好的推荐（交叉/向上销售）。例如，我正在寻找砂砾/越野自行车。 查看了最受欢迎的自行车卖家。 1. https://www.bikesonline.com/2022-marin-gestalt-gravel-bike 没有推荐。"Customers Also Viewed"部分看起来很奇怪。

2. https://www.chainreactioncycles.com/vitus-energie-evo-crs-cx-bike-force-2022/rp-prod202342 "头盔"和"夹克"？奇怪的套装。聊胜于无，但我想要更多。"也推荐"看起来很奇怪。

3. https://www.bike24.com/p2415518.html?menu=1000,173 "相关产品"向我展示了一组奇怪的产品--脚架、KNOT杆和非常昂贵的自行车。

4. https://www.merlincycles.com/merlin-malt-g2x-grx-gravel-bike-2022-197443.html 没有推荐。

5. https://www.competitivecyclist.com/why-cycles-r-v4-rival-gravel-bike?skid=WYC000G-TIT-L 类似的自行车--看起来很奇怪。"一起购买"--轮胎和管子？

我所期望的--其他人也看什么自行车，人们买了什么配件（鞋子、踏板、头盔、衣服、手套、备件等），建议我产品捆绑--最受欢迎的套装。

你认为，为什么流行的电子商务网站不建议更多相关商品？SaaS公司还没有达到他们的要求？企业不想实施推荐？其他原因？
description_zh-Hant:
嗨，

我想知道在許多電子商務網站上缺乏好的推薦（交叉/向上銷售）。例如，我正在尋找砂礫/越野自行車。 查看了最受歡迎的自行車賣家。 1. https://www.bikesonline.com/2022-marin-gestalt-gravel-bike 沒有推薦。"Customers Also Viewed"部分看起來很奇怪。

2. https://www.chainreactioncycles.com/vitus-energie-evo-crs-cx-bike-force-2022/rp-prod202342 "頭盔"和"夾克"？奇怪的套裝。聊勝於無，但我想要更多。"也推薦"看起來很奇怪。

3. https://www.bike24.com/p2415518.html?menu=1000,173 "相關產品"向我展示了一組奇怪的產品--腳架、KNOT杆和非常昂貴的自行車。

4. https://www.merlincycles.com/merlin-malt-g2x-grx-gravel-bike-2022-197443.html 沒有推薦。

5. https://www.competitivecyclist.com/why-cycles-r-v4-rival-gravel-bike?skid=WYC000G-TIT-L 類似的自行車--看起來很奇怪。"一起購買"--輪胎和管子？

我所期望的--其他人也看什麼自行車，人們買了什麼配件（鞋子、踏板、頭盔、衣服、手套、備件等），建議我產品捆綁--最受歡迎的套裝。

你認為，為什麼流行的電子商務網站不建議更多相關商品？SaaS公司還沒有達到他們的要求？企業不想實施推薦？其他原因？
